snippet.title: Those Who Remain - First Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Follow us on twitter for the latest updates: https://twitter.com/MrCamel101
Or sign up to our newsletter: www.ThoseWhoRemain.com

Those Who Remain is an upcoming indie thriller game coming soon to PS4, Xbox One, PC and Nintendo Switch later in 2019. This trailer is our first gameplay reveal teaser!

Alone in a ghost town and hunted by mysterious figures trapped in the darkness, the only way to survive is to stay in the light. Strange and dangerous creatures roam the streets, doorways connect our world to an alternative reality and an ordinary man with a troubled past is the only one left to uncover the secret of the darkness and save those who remain.
